text: Mark Pickerel is an American drummer. He is best known as the original drummer for the Screaming Trees. Pickerel played for the Screaming Trees on their first five studio albums and their extended play. He left the band in 1991. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American rock drummers Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Washington Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Ellensburg, Washington
title: Mark Pickerel
